body: Niiiiiiiiiiice.
Simon, my man, make us proud by making more vanilla content. Even though I'm already satisfied...

@0000.INFINITY 
Ooo, edgy. Well, not that I can blame you. We all have tropes we just loathe. Sometimes NTR is just necessary, eh?
@TraipsingExodus well damn that really happened? Well one thing surely didn't happen and that is I didn't remember asking you a goddamn thing. Fuck tsunderes.

@0000.INFINITY
Nah, you’re missing the context of the second part. I read Part 2 in Chinese and it stated that she felt insecure about their difference in station and felt that they would be forced apart. She eventually breaks and effusively confessed to him at the end though.

Damn, tsundere are absolute garbage, bitch should've been raped brutally bh the master and shared by his friends at school. Fucking dumb whore, can't even appreciate you're serving someone with elite status.

This shit is marvelous. Hope the second part don't fuck up like all of your previous ones.
7.3/10
I've been waiting for this for a long time
ahyes good indeed
Chapter 2 plz
Goddamn tsundere, need part two for more punishment

In my opinion, it's obvious that the maid of this story treats like shit his childhood friend because her humble status couldn't give them an happy ending for them; infact her "master" will have to marry someone, and she knows she can't be her because she's not rich. I also think she doesn't want to have an affair because of all the problems  and the very little posivites that will probably come by it  (like being to give on their true feelings, but risking to being caught red handed in the act of sex, or having a child out of wedlock, for example). So she tries to distance herself by him with her cheaky and bitchy attitude, to save herself and him by the consequences of a sad and impossible love story. But after they had sex, nothing will be the same. And i hope that the author will give them a good ending. This is a self indulgent comment, so take it for what is it, and not for what you wanted from it.
Oh. A decent childhood friend doujin from Simon after the last one which was a veritable shitfest. Hopefully, he doesn’t bungle that in the second part.
